channel.title: Starting Server-Error On Fr33Sc4p3
channel.description:
When I start the server it needs like 4 sec to load after it says started fr33sc4p3 server on 0.0.0.0:43594...but in the 4 secs someone tries to connect therefore the thing crashes and it shows an error...Has anyone got that error before? Do you know how to fix it?
this is the error i get
Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at server.run(server.java:151) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

@Zilchary wrote:

I mean like it started the server and then if somone connects the moment it starts the server crashes, u need to wait like 2 sec before someone comes otherwise it crashes and i have to close runserver and open it again >.>
